movie_title: The Minecraft Movie Was a Disaster
introduction: Today I'm discussing why the Minecraft Movie was a disaster, and why you shouldn't waste your time o

vocabulary.definition: serving a useful purpose; tending to build up
vocabulary.example: His feedback was constructive and helped me improve my presentation.

vocabulary.definition: not logically connected; disjointed; lacking order
vocabulary.example: The movie's plot was so incoherent that many viewers found it difficult to follow.

vocabulary.definition: completely lacking in a particular good quality or value
vocabulary.example: The creatively bankrupt film failed to engage audiences with its unoriginal storyline.

vocabulary.definition: not candid or sincere, typically by pretending that one knows less about something than one really does
vocabulary.example: Her compliments felt disingenuous as if she didn't truly mean them.

vocabulary.definition: the quality of being new, original, or unusual
vocabulary.example: The novelty of the game's mechanics wore off quickly after repeated plays.

vocabulary.definition: to pacify or placate (someone) by acceding to their demands
vocabulary.example: The government attempted to appease the protesters by offering concessions.
